item.title: 美元下挫，新兴市场几乎每个角落都在崛起
item.description:
十多年来，发展中资产一直是投资界的冷门，但随着特朗普肆虐美元，发展中资产正在崛起

。【原文：

After more than a decade as an afterthought in investing circles, developing assets are having a moment as Trump roils the dollar

】

item.title: 惠而浦下调 2025 年展望，关税提升被推迟
item.description: 惠而浦公司（Whirlpool Corp. ）下调了 2025 年的利润预期，称由于外国竞争对手在第二季度匆忙进口产品以规避更高的关税，惠而浦期望在美国生产大部分家电产品所带来的提振作用尚未实现。【原文：Whirlpool Corp. slashed its 2025 profit outlook, saying that the boost it expects from making the majority of its appliances in the US has yet to materialize as foreign rivals rushed imports into the country during the second quarter to avoid higher tariffs.】

item.title: 鏗騰設計公司承認非法向中國供貨並支付罰款
item.description: Cadence Design Systems 公司承认了指控该公司向中国国防科技大学出售硬件和软件违反美国出口管制的指控。【原文：Cadence Design Systems Inc. pleaded guilty to charges accusing the company of violating US export controls by selling hardware and software to China’s National University of Defense Technology.】

item.title: Desktop Metal 在律师要求支付未付费用后申请破产
item.description: 桌面金属公司（Desktop Metal Inc.【原文：Desktop Metal Inc., a maker of 3D printers and other machines used in manufacturing, filed bankruptcy just months after new owners were forced by a court to complete a takeover of the company.】

item.title: 特朗普盟友失去向公众开放 7 月 29 日美联储会议的机会
item.description: 华盛顿的一名联邦法官拒绝了唐纳德-特朗普总统的盟友领导的一家投资公司提出的公开旁听周二联邦公开市场委员会会议的请求。【原文：A federal judge in Washington denied a request by an investment firm led by an ally of President Donald Trump for public access to Tuesday’s Federal Open Market Committee meeting.】

item.title: FIS 与 Circle 合作提供银行稳定币支付服务
item.description: 银行技术提供商 Fidelity National Information Services Inc.正与 Circle Internet Group Inc.合作，为金融机构提供使用 Circle 稳定币进行交易的能力。【原文：Bank technology provider Fidelity National Information Services Inc. is partnering with Circle Internet Group Inc. to offer financial institutions the ability to conduct transactions using Circle’s stablecoin.】

item.title: 纽约市投资者为反马姆达尼活动寻求 2.5 万美元捐款
item.description: 激进投资人瑞奇-桑德勒（Ricky Sandler）和房地产高管马蒂-伯格（Marty Burger）呼吁捐赠者至少捐赠 2.5 万美元，用于反对佐赫兰-马姆达尼竞选纽约市市长。【原文：Activist investor Ricky Sandler and real estate executive Marty Burger are calling donors to commit at least $25,000 to an effort opposing Zohran Mamdani’s run for mayor of New York City.】

item.title: 美国为重建现金流将季度借贷规模扩大至 1 万亿美元
item.description: 美国财政部将本季度联邦借贷估计值上调至 1 万亿美元，这主要是由于债务限额造成的扭曲。【原文：The US Treasury jacked up its estimate for federal borrowing for the current quarter to $1 trillion, mainly due to distortions from the debt limit.】

item.title: 美国与欧盟达成贸易协议后，美元创五月份以来最大涨幅
item.description: 受美国和欧盟达成期待已久的贸易协议的提振，美元创下 5 月初以来的最大涨幅，有望实现今年以来的首次月度上涨。【原文：The dollar jumped the most since early May, putting it on track for its first monthly gain this year, bolstered by a long-awaited trade deal between the US and the European Union.】

item.title: 杰富瑞认为价值股和小盘股将加入美股创纪录的反弹行列
item.description: 杰富瑞（Jefferies）认为，推动美国股市创下一个又一个纪录的大盘成长股涨势即将再添一把火。【原文：The rally in large cap growth stocks that has powered US equities to record after record is about to get some fresh fuel, according to Jefferies.】

item.title: 多伦多数据中心考虑 3.2 亿加元资产抵押交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Urbacon 数据中心解决方案公司正在考虑借贷约 3.2 亿加元（约合 2.33 亿美元），以在多伦多新建一个数据中心作为抵押。【原文：Urbacon Data Centre Solutions is considering borrowing around C$320 million ($233 million) in a deal backed by a newly constructed data center in Toronto, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 奥德赛寻求 10 亿美元延长对工业电气的控股权
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，奥德赛投资合伙公司（Odyssey Investment Partners）正在提议设立一个单一资产延续基金，以扩大其对投资组合公司 Industrial Electric Mfg.【原文：Odyssey Investment Partners is pitching a single-asset continuation fund to extend its hold on portfolio company Industrial Electric Mfg., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 尽管油价疲软，企业仍看好二叠纪地区的恢复能力
item.description: 企业产品合伙公司（Enterprise Products Partners LP）是二叠纪盆地最大的管道运营商之一，该公司认为，尽管原油价格预计会下跌，但该地区今年的石油产量仍将保持增长。【原文：Enterprise Products Partners LP, one of the largest pipeline operators in the Permian Basin, sees oil production in the region holding up this year despite an expected drop in crude prices.】

item.title: 受移民政策打击的得克萨斯州企业增加工时、提高工资
item.description: 据达拉斯联邦储备银行周一公布的一项调查显示，得克萨斯州的企业因唐纳德-特朗普总统的移民政策而面临劳动力紧缩，这些企业的应对措施是为现有员工提供更多的工作时间，并提高工资和福利。【原文：Businesses in Texas that face a labor squeeze from President Donald Trump’s immigration crackdown are responding by offering more hours to existing employees and increasing wages and benefits, according to a survey published Monday by the Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas.】

item.title: 俄罗斯禁止炼油厂出口汽油以确保供应
item.description: 在无人机袭击和西方制裁暂时中断季节性维护之后，俄罗斯禁止汽油生产商在 8 月底之前出口燃料，以满足不断加速的需求。【原文：Russia banned gasoline producers from exporting the fuel until the end of August to meet accelerating demand, after drone attacks and Western sanctions temporarily disrupted seasonal maintenance.】

item.title: 纳米比亚将通过新上市和新工具拓展资本市场
item.description: 根据一项十年计划，纳米比亚寻求通过引入新的投资工具、增加本地上市和改善金融市场基础设施来扩大其资本市场。【原文：Namibia seeks to expand its capital markets by introducing new investment instruments, increasing local listings, and improving financial market infrastructure, according to a 10-year plan.】

item.title: DoorDash 聘请 Spotify 广告负责人担任首席营收官
item.description: DoorDash 公司聘请 Spotify Technology SA 全球广告主管 Lee Brown 担任首席营收官。【原文：DoorDash Inc. has hired Spotify Technology SA Global Head of Advertising Lee Brown as chief revenue officer.】

item.title: 微软的 Copilot 在新更新中将与您一起浏览网页
item.description: 微软公司正在将 Copilot 人工智能助手更深入地嵌入其浏览器，希望用户在整理信息和浏览网页时能发现这项服务的帮助。【原文：Microsoft Corp. is embedding the Copilot AI assistant deeper into its browser, betting that users will find the service helpful when sorting through information and navigating the web.】

item.title: 皮凯蒂告诉斯塔默在英国开征财富税
item.description: 包括托马斯-皮凯蒂（Thomas Piketty）在内的一批经济学家敦促英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）实施一项财富税，他们声称这项税收可以为英国国库筹集数百亿英镑。【原文：Prime Minister Keir Starmer has been urged by a group of economists including Thomas Piketty to implement a wealth tax they claim can raise tens of billions of pounds for the UK treasury.】

item.title: 当备忘录投资走向宏观
item.description:
投机性交易正在缓解美国的金融状况。【原文：

Speculative trading is easing US financial conditions.

】

item.title: 依视路推出智能眼镜，销售额超预期
item.description: EssilorLuxottica SA 公布的第二季度收入好于预期，但这家全球最大的眼镜制造商的利润受到关税和智能眼镜投资的影响。【原文：EssilorLuxottica SA posted better-than-expected revenue in the second quarter, though profit at the world’s biggest eyewear maker was held back by tariffs and its investments in smart glasses.】

item.title: 联合国报告称，尽管粮食价格上涨，但世界饥饿状况有所缓解
item.description: 联合国周一发布的一份分析报告显示，2024 年世界饥饿人口将减少，因为亚洲和南美洲饥饿人口的减少抵消了非洲饮食不足人口的增加。【原文：World hunger fell in 2024, as declines in Asia and South America offset an increase in the number of people who lacked adequate diets in Africa, according to a UN analysis released Monday.】

item.title: 德意志银行为伦敦奥林匹亚提供 12.5 亿英镑贷款
item.description: 德意志银行被选为英国最大的房地产项目之一--伦敦奥林匹亚展览中心重建项目的再融资方。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG. has been selected to refinance one of the biggest real estate projects in the UK, the redevelopment of London’s Olympia exhibition center.】

item.title: 停战后特朗普将与柬埔寨和泰国重启贸易谈判
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，在柬埔寨和泰国同意停止在有争议的边境地区的战斗后，他已要求美国官员恢复与两国的贸易谈判。【原文：President Donald Trump said he had asked US officials to resume trade negotiations with Cambodia and Thailand after the countries agreed to halt fighting along a disputed border.】

item.title: 卡尼称美加贸易谈判处于 "紧张阶段
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）表示，尽管美国总统最近的言论暗示与加拿大达成协议并非当务之急，但加拿大政府仍在与特朗普政府进行深入的贸易谈判。【原文：Prime Minister Mark Carney said his government is still in deep trade talks with the Trump administration despite recent comments from the US president that suggested a deal with Canada wasn’t a priority.】

item.title: 设计软件制造商 Figma 将 IPO 目标提高到 12 亿美元
item.description: Figma Inc. 将其美国首次公开募股的潜在规模提高到 12 亿美元，这家应用程序设计和协作软件公司即将迎来本年度最大的上市交易之一。【原文：Figma Inc. increased the potential size of its US initial public offering to $1.2 billion, as the app design and collaboration software company nears what could be one of the biggest listings of the year.】

item.title: 布朗大学在发出财务问题警告后获得 5 亿美元贷款
item.description: 布朗大学在常春藤盟校警告 "面临严峻的财务挑战 "之后，又获得了一笔 5 亿美元的私人贷款。【原文：Brown University took out another private loan, securing a $500 million agreement after the Ivy League school warned of “deep financial challenges.”】

item.title: Pemex 一年多来首次盈利，Sheinbaum 希望出售 100 亿美元债务
item.description: 一年多来，墨西哥石油公司首次扭亏为盈，这对这家陷入困境的国有石油公司来说是一个积极的信号，因为克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆总统的政府正寻求筹集多达 100 亿美元的资金来偿还公司的巨额债务。【原文：For the first time in more than a year, Petroleos Mexicanos has swung to a profit, a positive signal for the embattled state oil company as President Claudia Sheinbaum’s administration seeks to raise as much as $10 billion to pay down the company’s massive debts.】

item.title: 特朗普向俄罗斯施压要求迅速停战，乌克兰债券反弹
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普向俄罗斯弗拉基米尔-普京施压，要求其迅速停止乌克兰战争之后，乌克兰债券的涨幅创一个月来最大。【原文：Ukrainian bonds rose the most in a month after US President Donald Trump pressured Russia’s Vladimir Putin to quickly stop the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 智利寻求铜关税豁免，华盛顿会谈拉开帷幕
item.description: 智利财政部长马里奥-马塞尔（Mario Marcel）表示，智利是迄今为止向美国运输铜的最大国家，周一在华盛顿开始贸易谈判时，智利将力争免除美国计划对智利金属征收的关税。【原文：Chile, by far the biggest shipper of copper to the US, will push for an exemption from a planned US tariff on the metal when trade talks begin in Washington on Monday, Finance Minister Mario Marcel said.】
